meanings.sent1: She was undoubting in her ability to succeed.
meanings.sent2: He spoke with an undoubting tone, sure of his answer.
meanings.sent3: The undoubting squirrel confidently leaped from tree to tree.
meanings.sent4: Her undoubting belief in herself was like a shining beacon.
meanings.sent5: The undoubting hero faced the dragon without fear.

meanings.sent2: He undoubtingly followed the map to the treasure.
meanings.sent3: The cat undoubtingly chased its tail in circles.
meanings.sent4: The stars shone undoubtingly in the clear night sky.
meanings.sent5: The child undoubtingly believed in the magic of the wishing well.
